description: Crafted like a shirt but built like a jacket, you’ll want to get outdoors in the Aspen Shirt Jacket. Made with Polartec® Wind Pro® fleece for warmth and designed with a tighter knit construction to reduce wind chill, this top layer is water resistant while retaining breathability and comfort. Great for hiking, camping, traveling and chilling.
name: Vuori Aspen Shirt Jacket - Mens
